price: Basi wapuuze, nawe ngonja; hakika wao wanangoja.
footnotes: Na ikiwa kufanya maskhara kama hivi ndio mtindo wao, basi wapuuzilie mbali. Na wewe ngojea ukweli aliyo kuahidi Mola wako Mlezi juu yao, kwani wao wanakungojea ushindwe.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
